item.title: New file analysis and pivoting capabilities in Microsoft 365 Defender
item.description:
We’re excited to introduce a new file page that revolutionizes the way security teams can analyze and pivot across devices and cloud applications. This enhancement enables defenders to gain deeper insights into files, their prevalence across the organization, and their impact on security incidents. item.title: Introducing the new Microsoft Sentinel simplified pricing.
item.description:
We are excited to announce the new simplified pricing tiers for Microsoft Sentinel. Previously, there were separate prices for Log Analytics and Microsoft Sentinel. Now there is a single combined price for both components which simplifies budgeting, billing, and cost management.
Simplified pricing is rolling out for all regions throughout July. All new Microsoft Sentinel workspaces will automatically be on simplified pricing.
